title: me
body: Hi, I’m Ward Ruth, a highly skilled Senior Software Engineer living in the San Francisco Bay Area. Specializing in Front End development, I have been creating interactive user experiences since the late nineties. I enjoy big challenges like architecting new sites and features from scratch, and leading and working with smart dedicated teams to deliver awesome solutions. I’m looking for a company where I can make a difference. Drop me a line and let’s chat about what I can do for you.
